name: NSMB - Mario Vs Luigi | SM's Chaos Mod
name_original: NSMB - Mario Vs Luigi | SM's Chaos Mod
description:
This game is a mod of the game "NSMB - MarioVsLuigi! It removes the old maps and adds a bunch of new ones!

!NOTE!

You must play with a windows Pc, Linux, or MacBook!

-=-=-=-=-=Changelog=-=-=-=-=-

0.4.3 - Initial First Release

0.7.9 - Fixed map selection glitch, 3 Maps freeze the game, & Added 3 new maps!
